thread.title: A huge Amman statue erected for Aranmanai 2
thread.title_full: A huge Amman statue erected for Aranmanai 2 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: A huge Amman statue erected for Aranmanai 2
text:
The shooting of Sundar C's upcoming horror film Aranmanai 2, which has Siddharth, Trisha, Hansika and Poonam Bajwa in the lead, has been proceeding at a brisk pace in the city. Now, the team has erected an Amman statue, which is 103-foot-high, to can the climax sequence of the film.
A source close to the team says, "The art director of the film Gururaj, has designed this huge Amman statue for the climax portions of the film.This statue is said to be Asia's biggest statue, and in fact the team has plans to include it in the Limca Book of Records. Gururaj and his team took about 40 days to create this mammoth statue. It has come out really well and Sunder C is happy about the artwork. Hiphop Aadhi has composed an electrifying Amman song for the climax sequence."
